column5: Microsoft Corp  said it would cut about 2 850 more jobs over the next 12 months  taking its total planned job cuts to up to 4 700  or about 4 percent of its workforce.
July 28 Microsoft Corp said it would cut about 2 850 more jobs over the next 12 months  taking its total planned job cuts to up to 4 700  or about 4 percent of its workforce.

column4: BRIEF-Microsoft says to cut about 2 850 roles globally in addition to earlier plan
column5: * Microsoft Corp - Says currently evaluating impact of new standard related to revenue recognition - sec filing

column4: Tesla gets vote of confidence from a top investor at Fidelity
column5: BOSTON The manager of Fidelity's OTC Portfolio  a top investor in Tesla Motors Inc and SolarCity Corp  gave the electric automaker's strategies a vote of confidence in his most recent commentary to fund shareholders.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla gets vote of confidence from a top investor at Fidelity
column5: BOSTON  July 28 The manager of Fidelity's OTC Portfolio  a top investor in Tesla Motors Inc and SolarCity Corp  gave the electric automaker's strategies a vote of confidence in his most recent commentary to fund shareholders.

column4: Tesla gets vote of confidence from a top investor at Fidelity
column5: BOSTON  July 28 Fidelity's OTC Portfolio  a top investor in Tesla Motors Inc  gave the electric car maker a vote of confidence in its latest commentary  saying it boosted its position in the company during the second quarter.
